text: "Zitti e buoni" (; ) is a song by Italian rock band Måneskin. The song won the Sanremo Music Festival 2021 and the Eurovision Song Contest 2021. ==References== Category:2021 songs Category:Eurovision Song Contest winning songs Category:Glam rock songs Category:Måneskin Category:Punk rock songs Category:Sanremo Music Festival Category:Songs in Italian
title: Zitti e buoni
